snippet.title: Hauntii - Official Trailer | gamescom 2023
snippet.description:
Get another look at the mysterious, gorgeous world of Hauntii, see combat, and learn more about this action-adventure game in this latest trailer. Hauntii is a beguiling adventure in which you uncover the secrets of an expansive and mysterious world--haunting both the environment and its denizens to craft ingenious solutions to the many challenges that await. Hauntii will be available on PC and consoles in 2024.

#IGN #Gaming
